title: Mining armor
summaries: Mining armor is an armor set consisting of the Mining Helmet or Ultrabright Helmet, Mining Shirt, and Mining Pants. The helmets alone provide light when worn in the armor slot, but not when worn in the social slot. Each piece grants 1 defense (aside from the Ultrabright Helmet, which grants 4), for a total of 3 (or 6 with the Ultrabright Helmet) when the full set is worn. A full set also provides a set bonus of 30% increased mining speed.

• The Mining Shirt and Mining Pants are dropped from Undead Miners with a 12*3/25 (12%) / 2.4*3/125 (2.4%) chance.
  • The Mining Helmet can be purchased from the Merchant for 4 / 8.
    • The Mining Helmet is also a drop from Undead Miners with a 5*1/20 (5%) chance in the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version.
